summary:
About information

When I started my career in the Insurance Industry, I never realized that such an exceptional and rewarding career journey lay ahead of me. I gained a wealth of knowledge and experience with challenging and exceptional opportunities. Looking back today I realize that my journey is not complete with special paths that awaits me to explore. 

Having worked and led people and teams across the entire spectrum of the human resources functions in a Corporate and Consultative environment, the most rewarding for me has been in the talent domain. I have developed a passion for making organisations successful through the identification, development and management of people, leaders, managers and teams. 

Career Objective

My passion is people and realizing the talent and potential in all people to deliver organisational results and effectiveness. I wish to grow, build and expand my professional knowledge and experience, and put my experience, expertise and knowledge to practice to enable successful people, teams and organisations. 

My core focus areas are Talent Acquisition; Talent Management; Career Management; Succession Planning and Management; Leadership Development; Learning and Development; Coaching; Business Process Improvement; Continuous Improvement; and Organisational Design, Development and Effectiveness.

I am at my best and most inspired when finding fit-for-purpose solutions which enable movement.

projects.title: - Designed a holistic and integrated Talent Acquisition (recruit and selection) and Talent Management strategy and model creating organisation capability that delivered future business requirements.

- Designed, developed and implemented a Junior Career Development, Succession Planning, Coaching and Development model. This delivered talent at supervisory for mid management levels and was adopted and implemented as the Group Career Management Model.
- Designed, developed and implemented and executed a holistic and integrated Talent Management, Performance Management and Employee Development process for Supply Chain Management.

- Designed, developed and successfully implemented a HR Shared Services Centre for Recruitment, Employee Benefits and Organisational Management functions. This led to the development and establishment of a Global Shared Services Centre.
- Developed and designed a Competency and Career Management Model and Framework, that delivered talented, competent and future employees and business requirements.

- Developed and successfully implemented an Industrial and Organisation Psychometric Testing and Assessment best practices strategy and process across all levels, evolved to include Mechanization and Behaviour Based Safety.
- Participated and successfully led Organisational Work Design and Business Process Re-Engineering and Restructuring. (Working with McKinsey and Bain).
- Participated in the design and development of a middle and junior Leadership Development Program. Successfully designed and implemented an executive and senior leadership development program.

- Successfully designed, developed and executed an executive leadership assessment and development program (executive wisdom engagement) that delivered successors (leaders and executives), coaches and mentors.
- Successfully designed, developed and implemented a Talent Acquisition (recruitment and selection) strategy, policy, procedures and best practices.

publications.name: The Relation of Work Stressors to Work/Life Balance and Health in a Transforming Higher Education Institution

profile_positions.location: Gauteng, South Africa & Utrecht Area, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
	Develop and implement career management strategy, model and framework.
	Develop and implement people, work and organisational capability and competency model.
	Program and manage talent pools (people, leaders and management) to deliver future requirements, inclusive of succession planning and management.
	Design and implement talent development and career management maps and paths.
	Design and perform holistic and integrated psychometric (and behavioural) testing and assessment of people, teams and organisation for talent acquisition, talent identification and management, career management, succession planning and management, learning and development and leadership development.
	Provide coaching and mentoring to talent and leaders.
	Source critical skills for future business requirements and development (Talent Acquisition & Talent Management).
	Involve/lead various business process improvement, continuous improvement and business process re-engineering (BPR) processes.
	Conduct performance management process with individual development charters, plans and learning and development.
	Participate in work design and restructuring initiatives and processes.
	Design and implement management, leadership and executive wisdom programs.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director / Principal Consultant

profile_positions.description:
	Designed and delivered learning and development strategy, model and map.
	Reviewed Yokogawa Europe learning and development academy offering.
	Designed and developed SAP Successfactor project:
        	Learning management system
        	Skills/Competency management system
	Designed and developed Consultative Selling vs Sales and Marketing model and framework for organisational and people capability, learning and career development.
	Developed career development, paths and routes.
	Advised and co-ordinated senior leadership development programs.
profile_positions.title: Talent Management and Organisation Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
	Developed Recruitment strategy, policies and procedures for Platinum division, this developed into the establishment of a Shared Services Centre (SSC) and ultimately a Global Shared Services (GSS) for the Anglo American group of Companies. 
	Developed and implemented fit-for-purpose and best-practices sourcing strategies and processes to attract and retain critical and best-in-class employees (talent & leaders).
	Positioned the Company as employer of choice in the industry; reviewing and addressing inclusion, equality and diversity; employee engagement (on-boarding, induction and orientation); retention, and turnover.
	Aligned and integrated Recruitment (talent acquisition) and talent management strategies inclusive of workforce planning.
	Managed agency sourcing and contracting.
	Provided weekly, monthly and annual reporting and communication. 
	Developed and implemented people, team and organisation specific and appropriate psychometric testing and assessment instruments (assessment centers) and practices for talent acquisition, learning and development, talent management, succession planning and management, career management, behavior based safety, and mechanized mining.
	Developed and implemented performance management system for critical job categories.
	Developed career development maps/paths/routes for all functions.
	Managed talent management and succession planning and management process.
	Identified, designed and developed junior career management framework and model (adopted as the model for the Anglo American group of companies).
	Designed and developed well-ness programs to support employees.
	Led and participated in various Change and Transformation (Organisational Design and Development) Projects:
- Business Process Re-Engineering (BPR); 
- Business Process Improvement;
- Continuous Improvement Interventions
	Involved in Organizational Restructuring programs.
profile_positions.title: Human Resources Manager
